column2: the service was outstanding. They were busy and other people at the bar were celebrating their birthdays too. But their service was so exceptional
column3: I felt like I was the only guest there. I cannot say how impressed I was overall with Uchi. They made my birthday even more special and memorable and I'll definitely be back again! If you get a chance
column4: try to sit at the bar
column6: and watch them work their magic.
